What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Fast Food > Resolved Question Tiffani&Mango Member since: 01 September 2006 Total points: 169 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » What is the healthiest fast food place? Like In N Out Burger, Del Taco, Burger King, Taco Bell, McDonalds, those kind of places. Which fast food place is the healthiest for you??
Thanks :) 4 years ago Report Abuse by ɐʇıloႨ™✌ Member since: 21 March 2008 Total points: 60,641 (Level 7) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters In my opinion I'd say El Pollo Loco and Yoshinoya besides Subway, Togos, and Quizno's. 4 years ago Report Abuse 85% 22 Votes 10 people rated this as good
Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo!7 Add to Del.icio.us RSS
There are currently no comments for this question.
* You must be logged into Answers to add comments. Sign in or Register .
This question about" What is the healthie… "was originally asked on Yahoo! Answers United States
Other Answers (24) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by Katey Member since: 29 April 2006 Total points: 3,697 (Level 4) Add Contact Block Subway. If not, I'd have to say Del Taco if its a real mexican place (I've never heard of it so you'll have to figure that out) If not, its probably Burger King because they charbroil their burgers rather than grilling them in grease and fat. 4 years ago Report Abuse 4% 1 Vote by Courtney Member since: 27 January 2008 Total points: 694 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Well, what I consider fast food is McDonalds, BK, Wendy's, Taco Bell, KFC, and Arby's...so out of those I say Wendy's because they have things like Baked Potatoes and Healthier Salads and stuff...McDonalds is def. the unhealthiest though 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by JDH. Member since: 10 November 2007 Total points: 2,286 (Level 3) Add Contact Block McDonalds, obviously. I get a 10 piece chicken selects, large fries and a strawberry milkshake and I know I am doing something healthy for myself. Actually, McDonald's is working on reformulating their foods to low/no calorie versions. 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Madi's Mommy Member since: 17 February 2008 Total points: 2,748 (Level 4) Add Contact Block Chick-Fil-A. There are a ton of options on the menu that are very low in fat and have low calories also. My favorite is the chargrilled chicken sandwich with the fruit cup. It comes out to only 350 calories. 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by SoCal Member since: 09 May 2008 Total points: 1,369 (Level 3) Add Contact Block subway is the healthiest and subway is also the most fattening... it all depends on what you order... i only order a roast beef sandwich at subway so that is pretty healthy 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Lady J Member since: 06 June 2008 Total points: 180 (Level 1) Add Contact Block Subway or Wendy's have the most healthy selections but McDonalds and Burger King also provide soups and salad so just be careful what you order. Subway is your best bet though! 4 years ago Report Abuse 4% 1 Vote by Audrey Member since: 20 October 2006 Total points: 218 (Level 1) Add Contact Block Subway, Chik -Fil a, or Wendys maybe Quiznos but someone told me quiznos sandwiches suck http://www.liquidfocus.com.au/gallery/d/261-2/eat_more_chicken.jpg
OH AND INN AND OUT burgers! yum 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Lauren B Member since: 25 June 2008 Total points: 210 (Level 1) Add Contact Block Any fast food because usually every fast food restaurant has salds now days 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by The girl next door Member since: 01 July 2007 Total points: 858 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Fresh Choice Restaurant, Panda Express
also Subway but if you add all that stuff on it just as bad as the other places. 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by curiousk Member since: 30 May 2008 Total points: 5,874 (Level 5) Add Contact Block Out of the choices above, I would probably say McDonalds because they do have some healthy foods (not many). But the best place is Subway. 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Ally Member since: 28 June 2008 Total points: 623 (Level 2) Add Contact Block I love Subway. I get their Veggie Delite sub with pepper jack cheese, all the veggies except forblack olives, and vinegar. Very low calories! 4 years ago Report Abuse 4% 1 Vote by KendraF Member since: 29 September 2007 Total points: 1,998 (Level 3) Add Contact Block McDonalds!!!!!!!!! Haha no jk um idk maybe subway 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by N D Member since: 24 March 2007 Total points: 1,024 (Level 3) Add Contact Block subway or chick fil a but you have to watch the mayo and special sauces. 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by ? Member since: 11 June 2008 Total points: 7,854 (Level 5) Add Contact Block BK. 4 years ago Report Abuse 4% 1 Vote by Cool G Member since: 28 June 2008 Total points: 423 (Level 2) Add Contact Block it all depends on what you order! so go where you want, just order smart! =) 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Shawn K Member since: 28 June 2008 Total points: 308 (Level 2) Add Contact Block taco bell or subway 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by lizzymcg... Member since: 29 January 2008 Total points: 202 (Level 1) Add Contact Block subway or an organic resturant 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by mon97 Member since: 21 June 2008 Total points: 239 (Level 1) Add Contact Block I say pollo locos and subway who knows not me thats all I know!! 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by agathafr... Member since: 27 June 2008 Total points: 748 (Level 2) Add Contact Block subway, but if your looking for burgers wendys is becasue they char grill them instead of fry 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by mfejak Member since: 25 June 2008 Total points: 719 (Level 2) Add Contact Block SUBWAY!!
but the sauce is really fat but the rest is healthy 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by sammiie Member since: 01 June 2008 Total points: 997 (Level 2) Add Contact Block extreme pita, mega wraps, and subway skip the cheese 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Ashley Elizabeth Member since: 08 March 2006 Total points: 420 (Level 2) Add Contact Block chick filet cuz they grill their food and dont fry 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Lou K Member since: 06 May 2008 Total points: 868 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Subway is tops 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by R.status Member since: 22 June 2008 Total points: 274 (Level 2) Add Contact Block subway man 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes
